Yellow + Blue = Green: instantly heals the host for 4% HP.

three_piece: Gain 50% Crit DMG. Under Herrscher Form, gain 15% Crit Rate.

name: Summer Day
top_e: When the host is attacking, generates a water balloon (summoned entity) on the spot that explodes after a 3s delay to deal 150% (300% at 5★) ATK of Ice DMG (DMG calculations are based on the host's stats); CD: 9.0s.
mid_e: Requires Stigma (T). When the water balloon explodes, attacks of allies within the explosion AOE gain 18% (30% at 5★) Fire, Ice, and Lightning DMG for 4.5s (6.0s at 5★). This effect cannot stack.
bot_e: Requires Stigma (T). When water balloon explodes, heals allies within the AOE for 110 (200 at 5★) HP.
two_piece: Enlarges the AOE of the water balloon explosion by 2 meters. Enemies within the explosion AOE are frozen for 1.5s.
three_piece: Exploding water balloon deals 200% more Ice DMG. Shortens CD by 2s.

name: Tesla Band
top_e: After exit, team gains 5% (10% at 5★) Physical DMG (effect cannot stack). When on the field, the host gains 5% (15% at 5★) Physical DMG and 5% (20% at 5★) faster Attack Speed.
mid_e: After exit, allies gain 5% (15% at 5★) Lightning DMG Resistance and attacks deal 5% (15% at 5★) more Lightning DMG (effect cannot stack). When on the field, the host takes 10% (25% at 5★) less Physical DMG from enemy hits.
bot_e: After exit, team gains 5% (10% at 5★) Move Speed (effect cannot stack). When on the field, the host gains 20% (35% at 5★) Lightning DMG and 5% (10% at 5★) Move Speed.
two_piece: Every Basic ATK (including Charged and Combo ATKs) grants 1 Accord Charge stack (CD: 1s). After gaining 4 Accord Charge stacks, reset stacks to zero and unleash Chain Lightning that attacks 4 random targets, paralyzing them for 5s and dealing 600% ATK of Lightning DMG to the first target, with each leap dealing 20% less total Lightning DMG to enemies. Chain Lightning does not hit the same target twice. CD: 15s.
three_piece: Gain 20% Max HP and 40% Lightning DMG in battle. Lightning DMG dealt by Chain Lightning no longer decays with each leap.

name: Thales
top_e: Gain 10% (25% at 5★) Total DMG Multiplier. For every Combo Hit Count, the host gains 0.9% (1.5% at 5★) Fire DMG. Stacks up to 10 times.
mid_e: Gain 10% (20% at 5★) Total DMG Multiplier. Every hit (CD: 0.3s) on the enemy will cause it to take 1.0% (2.0% at 5★) more Fire DMG from the host for 5s. Stacks up to 10 times. Each stack gained resets the duration.
bot_e: Gain 5% (15% at 5★) Attack Speed. For every Combo Hit Count, the host receives 0.9% (1.5% at 5★) less Physical DMG from hits taken. Stacks up to 10 times.
two_piece: Gains 1 charge every 10s. For the next Charged ATK and a short duration thereafter, gain 50% Total DMG Multiplier, then enter Blazer Mode for 5s. During Blazer Mode, the host's Ultimate attacks gain 30% Total DMG Multiplier.
three_piece: In Blazer Mode, the host gains Ignore Interrupt, 15% Total DMG Reduction from hits taken from the enemy, and heals self for 50 HP/s.

name: Turgenev
top_e: The host and her summoned entities gain 10.0% (20.0% at 5★) Ice DMG. Team and the host's summoned entities gain 9.0% (18.0% at 5★) Total DMG when there are Hunter Marked enemies on the field. This effect cannot stack.
mid_e: The host's summoned entities deal 20.0% (35.0% at 5★) more Total DMG. The host's QTE deals 12.0% (25.0% at 5★) more Ice DMG against Hunter Marked enemies.
bot_e: The host's attack triggers an explosion centering on the target, which inflicts a 6-sec Hunter Mark on enemies with no Hunter Mark within the explosion AOE. Explosion CD: 8s. Team and the host's summoned entities deal 18.0% (36.0% at 5★) more All Elemental DMG against Hunter Marked enemies; this effect cannot stack.
two_piece: Every 6 hits from the host or her summoned entities prolongs the Hunter Mark effect for 2s. Hunter Mark max duration: 12s. Combo counter resets when Hunter Mark disappears. Hunter Marked enemies receive 21.0% All Elemental DMG (cannot stack).
three_piece: The host's Ultimate and her summoned entities deal 25.0% more Total DMG. When there are the host's summoned entities on the field, team deals 25.0% more Ice DMG against Hunter Marked enemies. This effect cannot stack.

name: Verne
top_e: Ice DMG increases by 10.0% (20.0% at 5★). Charged ATKs deal 20.0% (40.0% at 5★) bonus Total DMG.
mid_e: Total DMG increases by 10.0% (20.0% at 5★). On hit, Charged ATKs deal 15.0% (30.0% at 5★) bonus Ice DMG for 10s. Can be refreshed.
bot_e: Attack Speed increases by 10.0% (20.0% at 5★). Basic & Charged ATKs deal 30.0% (50.0% at 5★) bonus Ice DMG.
two_piece: Triggering Ultimate Evasion in Burst mode boosts Total DMG by 30.0% for 12s. Can be refreshed. In Burst mode, Charged ATKs boost Ice DMG by 15.0% on hit (CD: 0.3s) until Burst mode ends. 4 stacks max. Reaching 4 stacks deals 900.0% ATK of Ice DMG to enemies nearby. CD: 20s.
three_piece: Charged ATKs restore 2 bonus SP on hit (CD: 2s). When it's equipped by Seele and she is deployed, all enemies take 20.0% bonus Ice DMG.

name: Wang Zhenyi
top_e: Lightning DMG increases by 22.5% (45.0% at 5★). Weapon actives grant Mitternacht status and restore 5.0 (10.0 at 5★) SP on hit. Mitternacht lasts 12s and a 15.0s CD.
mid_e: Host and her summoned entities deal 7.5% (15.0% at 5★) bonus Total DMG. Switching out ends Mitternacht and boosts Lightning DMG dealt by team members and summoned entities by 7.5% (15.0% at 5★) for 18.0s. Triggering it again resets the duration (cannot stack).
bot_e: Elemental DMG increases by 12.5% (25.0% at 5★). Weapon actives make enemies hit take 10.0% (20.0% at 5★) bonus Lightning DMG for 20s. Triggering it again resets the duration.
two_piece: Total DMG increases by 25.0%. Host deals 30.0% bonus Lightning DMG within 12.0s after her entry.
three_piece: Weapon skills and Ultimate deal 25.0% bonus Lightning DMG. Fischl equip bonus: Casting QTE during Mitternacht boosts Total DMG dealt by team members and summoned entities by 45.0% for 20.0s. Triggering it again resets the duration.

name: Welt Yang
top_e: Gain 11% (20% at 5★) Total DMG Multiplier. Herrscher Form: Gain 26% (50% at 5★) Ice DMG.
mid_e: Gain 11% (20% at 5★) Ice DMG. Every hit (CD: 0.3s) on the enemy causes it to take 0.4% (1.0% at 5★) more Ice DMG from the host for 5s. Max stacks: 10. Each stack gained resets the duration.
bot_e: Gain 8% (15% at 5★) Total DMG Multiplier. Gain a shield when freezing enemies and heal 20 (50 at 5★) HP/s for 10s. CD: 15s. Shield shatters when hit, but host will not be interrupted.
two_piece: Each 15 non-Charged ATK gives a Charged ATK buff: Next Charged ATK and following Charged ATK for 5s gain 60% Total DMG Multiplier. Count ends after the buff ends. Host directly gains Charged ATK buff when entering battle (triggers 1 time per battle).
three_piece: Gain 40% Ice DMG. For 16s after casting the Ultimate, Charged ATKs will generate a 3s Gravity Vortex that pulls-in nearby enemies. CD: 4s.

name: Wilde
top_e: Gains 15% (30% at 5★) Physical DMG. When entering global Time Fracture, the host gains 10.0% (20.0% at 5★) Attack Speed for 4s.
mid_e: Activates at below 20% HP. Heals the host for 400 (800 at 5★) HP. CD: 30s.
bot_e: Gain 5% (10% at 5★) Crit Rate. Charged ATK bleed the target and nearby enemies in a small AOE to inflict 250 (400 at 5★) Physical DMG every 0.5s for 3s. CD: 12.0s (9.0s at 5★).
two_piece: If the host takes DMG exceeding 15% Max HP within a short time, then enter Potential Mode to gain 30% Total DMG Multiplier for 5s. CD: 12s.
three_piece: Gain 50% Crit DMG. Extends duration of Potential Mode by 2s.

name: Yae Sakura
top_e: Hits from an enemy with a Sakura Brand have a 40% chance of dealing 40% (80% at 5★) less Physical DMG and stunning the attacker for 1s. One Slash also gains 35% Crit DMG.
mid_e: Basic ATKs (including Charged and Combo ATKs) against enemies marked by Sakura Brand deal another 30% (50% at 5★) ATK of Physical DMG. CD: 1s. 20% chance to deal an equal amount of Physical DMG to nearby enemies. One Slash also gains 10% Total DMG Multiplier.
bot_e: For each enemy with Sakura Brand, gain 4% (7% at 5★) Total DMG Multiplier. Stacks up to 5 times. One Slash also gains 5% Crit Rate.
two_piece: Gain 20% Max HP in battle. Attacks against enemies marked by Sakura Brand deal 30% more Physical DMG.
three_piece: Upon killing an elite, heals the host for 30% HP. CD: 10s.

name: Zhangheng
top_e: When Combo Hit Count is below 20, non-Switch skills gain 10% (25% at 5★) Total DMG Multiplier.
mid_e: When Combo Hit Count is below 20, hits from the enemy deal 18% (30% at 5★) less Physical DMG.
bot_e: When Combo Hit Count is below 20, and for 2s after Ultimate Evasion, Lightning DMG increases by 80% (120% at 5★).
two_piece: When there are enemies nearby, emit a seismic wave with a 3-meter radius from the host every 5s. For every 3 seismic waves, the first 2 will knock down non-boss enemies and the 3rd will stun non-boss enemies for 3s.
three_piece: When there are 3 or more enemies on the battlefield, all allies gain 15% Physical DMG and 25% Crit DMG. This effect cannot stack.

name: Zhuge Kongming
top_e: Shortens the CD of effects triggered by Ultimate Evasions (defense) by 17% (26% at 5★).
mid_e: 22% (31% at 5★) chance of taking 124 (418 at 5★) less DMG (of any type) when attacked.
bot_e: When Combo Hit Count exceeds 20, 50, or 100, gain 24%, 48%, and 73% (41%, 82%, and 123% at 5★) DEF respectively.
two_piece: When attacked by enemies, the host gains Ignore Interrupt level for 4s. CD: 10s. Kiana or Kallen equip bonus: Gain 30% Max HP in battle.
three_piece: When attacked by enemies, there is a 20% chance to knock back enemies within a 3-meter radius. CD: 6s.

name: Zorro
top_e: Gain 10% (20% at 5★) Total DMG Multiplier. After an Ultimate Evasion, gain 1.0 (3.0 at 5★) SP.
mid_e: Gain 25% (40% at 5★) Crit DMG. After Ultimate Evasion, gain an additional 10% (15% at 5★) Crit Rate for 5s. Triggering this skill again resets the duration.
bot_e: Gain 15% (20% at 5★) Physical DMG. After Ultimate Evasion, gain an additional 15% (20% at 5★) Physical DMG for 5s. Triggering this skill again resets the duration.
two_piece: Gain 1 charge for every 10s on the field. When there are nearby enemies deal 100% ATK of Lightning DMG to a random nearby enemy and stun them for 0.5s. The host also enters Destreza mode. Any evasion will trigger Ultimate Evasion effects (Destreza ends upon Ultimate Evasion). Unleash a Lightning Shockwave when going on the field for the first time. After Ultimate Evasion, Combo / Charged ATKs gain 20% Total DMG Multiplier for 5s. Triggering the effect again resets the duration.
three_piece: After Ultimate Evasion, the next attack unleashes a Z-slash (CD: 10s). The Z-slash deals 300% ATK of Physical DMG to enemies within a small AOE. Also applies impair, lowering enemy DEF by 50% for 5s.
